criticism: Integer overflow in mintToken function allows the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value, aka the 'integerOverflow' issue.
Integer overflow in buy function allows a potential trap due to overflow of 'amount' variable, aka the 'integerOverflow' issue.
The setPrices function allows attackers to set buy price arbitrarily, aka the 'priceManipulation' issue.
freezeAccount function allows attackers to freeze arbitrary accounts, aka the 'wrongLogicInAccessControl' issue.
